title: Ping Issues ( Rogers ) New Brunswick, Canada
body: I was on a trip to Toronto for the NA finals and before I left on the 25th everything was fine then when I returned 3 days ago ever since then my ping has been 100+ every game and normally it's between 45-60

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having some trouble maintaining a strong connection, which can happen for a few reasons like packet loss.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to pinpoint what's going wrong.  The results will also provide some fixes for you.  I hope you had fun at the finals!
thanks for the reply but that doesn't really provide anything with a fix lol
